definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Dunga had been in charge of his country since 2006, succeeding Carlos Alberto Parreira.
sentences.chinese: 鄧加在06年取代佩雷拉成爲國家隊主帥至今。

sentences.english: That Manlian camp of yours has been waiting too long for you as its general.
sentences.chinese: 你們的曼利安軍營等待你當他們的主帥已久。

sentences.english: He is our manager now and we have to go out and fight for him.
sentences.chinese: 現在他是我們的主帥，我們將與他一起戰鬥。

sentences.english: The Gunners manager has openly admitted his frustration with Domenech's decision making.
sentences.chinese: 這位槍手主帥公開承認他曾對多梅內克決定感到不滿。

sentences.english: Former Italy coach Marcello Lippi is a big fan of Massimiliano Allegri.
sentences.chinese: 前意大利主帥裏皮是阿萊格里的大粉絲。

sentences.english: Commander in Chief confidence Man Manbing said that Durante will return the young vanguard position.
sentences.chinese: 主帥信心滿滿並稱杜蘭特將回歸小前鋒位置。

sentences.english: As is always the case when Liverpool meet Chelsea, much is being made of the tactical battle between the two managers.
sentences.chinese: 當利物浦碰切爾西，總是會成爲兩名主帥的戰術之爭。

sentences.english: These are played every Tuesday. National team line-up is always set by its national coach.
sentences.chinese: 每週二舉行，國家隊參賽陣容由國家隊主帥設置。

sentences.english: The manager is also keen to have the option of Eboué for midfield duties.
sentences.chinese: 這位主帥還渴望埃布埃能夠復出爲中場提供選擇。

sentences.english: United's Reserves provided a fitting send-off for departing manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, hammering Newcastle United at Moss Lane.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯預備隊用主場大勝紐卡來爲主帥索爾斯克亞送行。

sentences.english: But Blues boss Jose Mourinho has yet to give his permission for the sale.
sentences.chinese: 但是藍軍主帥穆里尼奧對這樁交易亮了綠燈。

sentences.english: Arsenal boss Wenger will also not face any punishment for confronting ref Andre Marriner at the end of Sunday's game.
sentences.chinese: 賽後質疑主裁的阿森納主帥溫格也不會面臨任何處罰。

sentences.english: I don't think the players are in any position to question who the manager picks.
sentences.chinese: 我不認爲球員應該對主帥的選人提出疑問。

sentences.english: Brazil coach Denga has highlighted the Netherlands' rapid counter-attacks.
sentences.chinese: 巴西主帥鄧加特意強調了荷蘭快速反擊的打法。

sentences.english: It is the only thing that matters - Harry Redknapp is well aware of that.
sentences.chinese: 這是熱刺主帥雷德克納普目前最重視的比賽。

sentences.english: We are all in it together, the owners the management, the players and the supporters.
sentences.chinese: 我們都團結在一起，老闆，主帥，球員，球迷。

definition: to heal a wound/to recuperate (from an injury)
sporting coach/military drill master (in Song times)
